meanings.definition: A woman with exceptional strength, abilities, or powers.
meanings.sent1: The superwoman lifted the heavy car effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She is considered a superwoman because she can do things others can't.
meanings.sent3: The superwoman used her super strength to open a jar of pickles.
meanings.sent4: To her colleagues, she was a superwoman, capable of solving any problem.
meanings.sent5: The image of a superwoman flying through the sky stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: A woman who is admired for her outstanding achievements or qualities.
meanings.sent1: Everyone looks up to the superwoman for her incredible accomplishments.
meanings.sent2: She became a superwoman in the eyes of many after her successful charity work.
meanings.sent3: The superwoman's ability to always be on time for meetings was legendary.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, she was a superwoman, leading her team to victory.
meanings.sent5: Her kindness and generosity made her a superwoman in the hearts of those she helped.
